item.title: add(bug 59056)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 59056) - Render individual slideshow shapes

item.title: fix(bug 59074)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59074) - ExtractorFactory should give a more helpful exception on old Excel files too old for ExcelExtractor

item.title: add(bug 57989)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57989) - XSSFChart support for setting chart titles

item.title: fix(bug 59030)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59030) - Prevent NPE in XWPFTableCell's getVerticalAlignment() from Prasad Babu

item.title: fix(bug 59021)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 59021) - XSSFSheetXMLHandler fails to extract content if namespace is included in qName

item.title: fix(bug 56345)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56345) - Reject single-cell merged regions

item.title: fix(bug 58339)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58339) - Make OFFSET() allow missing optional height and width parameters

item.title: add(bug github-27)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug github-27) - Handle documents with a picture-only header

item.title: fix(bug 58996)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58996) - Regression caused by fixing bug 56295: Don't try to unset fill color if it is not set to avoid invalid access inside the Xml structures

item.title: fix(bug 57034)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 57034) - Cell.setCellValue((String)null) should be treated as an empty cell on SXSSF as well, to avoid a NPE when autosizing columns

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI Developers - XSLF - fixed NPE when adding pictures with existing non-picture media files (e.g. movies)

item.title: fix(bug 58885)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58885) - Fixed preformance regression after fixing bug 58443 when adding a merged region to an XSSFSheet.

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI Developers - Raised xmlsec version to 2.0.6

item.title: add(bug 47291)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 47291) - Cannot open link correctly which insert in ppt

item.title: add(bug 41047)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 41047) - Support hyperlinks in HSLF shapes and textruns

item.title: add(bug 58879)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58879) - Return SpreadsheetVersion from Workbook

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI Developers - Fix NPE when calling HSLFTextRun.setHorizontalCentered()

item.title: add(bug 58633)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58633) - Set multiple cell style properties at once

item.title: add(bug 56004)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 56004) - Support for WMF rendering

item.title: add(bug 56892)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 56892) - Add API for inserting ignored warnings into XSSF sheets. This can be used e.g. to suppress 'number stored as text' warnings.

item.title: add(bug 58847)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58847) - Getters/setters/removers for the additional well-known document summary information properties from Office 12

item.title: add(bug 57796)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 57796) - Support hyperlink extraction when rendering slides

item.title: fix(bug 54916)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 54916) - POI does not always read all the slides in pptx files

item.title: fix(bug 58043)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58043) - Provide some compatibility between HSSF and XSSF in regards to values for CellStyle.setRotation()

item.title: fix(bug 58067)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58067) - XWPF: don't return deleted text when document is in review-mode

item.title: fix(bug 58618)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58618) - XWPFParagraph insertNewRun and removeRun work incorrectly for runs after hyperlink/field runs

item.title: fix(bug 58760)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58760) - Non-standard namespace-key breaks parsing XLSX files

item.title: fix(bug 58746)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58746) - Fix missing adjustment of formulas when sheet-ordering is changed.

item.title: fix(bug 58616)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58616) - Try to initialize with empty password if not done before

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI Developers - Fix some cases where file-handles were left open, mostly when failing to parse documents

item.title: fix(bug 55030)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 55030) - RichTextRun getFontName can not get chinese font name

item.title: fix(bug 56570)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 56570) - RecordType has repeat by code type 3009

item.title: fix(bug 58159)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58159) - getHeaderText() and getFooterText() duplicate text in sheet.getTextRuns()

item.title: fix(bug 58775)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58775) - Set maximum number of data formats to avoid corrupted workbook

item.title: add(bug 58778)
item.description: add by POI Developers (bug 58778) - Override built-in number formats in XSSFWorkbooks

item.title: fix(bug 58733)
item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58733) - New AIOOBE in getCell while iterating through a table in PPT

item.description: fix by POI Developers (bug 58718) - Master styles not initialized when running multithreaded
